General.Name: Wuhan PS Information Tech
General.Description: Wuhan P&S Information Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the agency distribution of the upperstream of electronic components and self-developed chip business in China. The company provides MCUs and MPUs, data converters, switches, sensors, special and passive ICs, digital potentiometers, optoelectronics, and connectors. It also offers system management, communication interface, signal conditioning, power management, digital logic, clock management, memory, power, and discrete products. In addition, the company is involved in the research and development, production, and marketing of downstream solutions and modules; and the research and development, production, and marketing of terminal products of ubiquitous electric internet of things. Further, it operates ICkey, an e-commerce platform. It serves mobile communication, automobile, home appliances, security monitoring, industrial control, wireless communication, Internet of Things, and other industries. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Wuhan, China.
